subject: Import duties
description_text:
Hello, i recently purchased a pair of pedals from you and i really thought that you guys had a European warehouse.

I was just slapped with a 95$ fee for import.

Please add at checkout that it will be sent from China so users may know that before ordering.

Thanks
Jesper

conversations.body_text: Hi Jesper MÃ¼llern,    Sorry, our German warehouse is out of stock. We apologize for the inconvenience.
